languages.text: "Служители Омниссии страшатся и презирают подобную техноересь. Мне не раз приходилось карать нечестивцев, поддавшихся искушению ксенотехнологий".

traits.locale_text: "Служители Омниссии страшатся и презирают подобную техно-ересь. Мне не раз приходилось карать нечестивцев, поддавшихся искушению ксено-технологий".

languages.text: "The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."
languages.original_text: "Служители Омниссии страшатся и презирают подобную техноересь. Мне не раз приходилось карать нечестивцев, поддавшихся искушению ксенотехнологий".

traits.locale_text: "The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."
"The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. I had to punish the wicked who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech quite a few times."
"The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."
"The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."
"The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."

languages.text: 「万機神の従者はこのような異端技術を恐れ、忌み嫌う。異星技術の誘惑に負けた邪悪な魂を、我はこれまで何度も罰してきたのです」
languages.original_text: "The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の従者はこのような異端技術を恐れ、忌み嫌う。異星技術の誘惑に負けた邪悪な魂を、我はこれまで何度も罰してきたのです」

languages.text: «Los sirvientes del Omnissiah temen y odian semejante tecnoherejía. Más de una vez me ha correspondido castigar a las almas malvadas que habían sucumbido a la tentación de la xenotecnología».
languages.original_text: "The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."

traits.locale_text: «Los sirvientes del Omnissiah temen y odian semejante tecnoherejía. Más de una vez me ha correspondido castigar a las almas malvadas que habían sucumbido a la tentación de la xenotecnología».

languages.text: “欧姆尼塞亚的仆人惧怕、鄙夷这种异端科技。我不止一次被指派执行任务，惩罚那些受异形科技诱惑的邪恶灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."

traits.locale_text: “欧姆尼塞亚的仆人惧怕、鄙夷这种异端科技。我不止一次被指派执行任务，惩罚那些受异形科技诱惑的邪恶灵魂。”

languages.text: « Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie craignent et condamnent ce genre de technohérésie. J'ai été contraint plus d'une fois de sanctionner les âmes impures qui avaient succombé à la tentation de la xénotechnologie. »
languages.original_text: "The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."

traits.locale_text: « Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie craignent et condamnent ce genre de technohérésie. J'ai été contraint plus d'une fois de sanctionner les âmes impures qui avaient succombé à la tentation de la xénotech. »

languages.text: "Die Diener des Omnissiah fürchten und verachten solche Tech-Ketzerei. Mehr als einmal musste ich die bösen Seelen bestrafen, die der Versuchung der Xenotech erlegen sind."
languages.original_text: "The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."

traits.locale_text: "Die Diener des Omnissiah fürchten und verachten solche Tech-Ketzerei. Mehr als einmal musste ich die bösen Seelen bestrafen, die der Versuchung der Xenotech erlegen sind."

languages.text: "Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, böylesi tekno kâfirliklerden korkar ve nefret eder. Zeno teknolojilerinin cazibesine kapılan günahkârları kaç kez cezalandırmam gerekmişti."
languages.original_text: "The servants of the Omnissiah fear and despise such tech-heresy. More than once I have been required to punish the wicked souls who succumbed to the temptation of xenotech."
